original_text: The Lord appeared to Abram there. He said, ‘I will give this land to your descendants.’ So Abram built an altar in that place to worship the Lord. He did that because the Lord had appeared to him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브람에게 나타나 이르시되 내가 이 땅을 네 자손에게 주리라 하신지라 자기에게 나타나신 여호와께 그가 그 곳에서 제단을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: The Lord appeared to Abram there.
'I will give this land to your descendants.'
So Abram built an altar in that place
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아브람은 그 곳에 제단을 쌓았습니다

sentences.original_text: because the Lord had appeared to him.
